Home.Title: Welcome to InterLab
Home.Description:
Explore the stock performance of Tesla, Microsoft, and Apple with our intuitive application.
Gain valuable insights, track historical trends, and make informed investment decisions.

With our unique filtering feature, you can easily focus on the specific company you want to analyze.
Additionally, save your favorite stocks for quick access and efficient portfolio management.

Bookmark.Title: List of bookmarks
Bookmark.Description:
Here you find the stock market performances which you have registered in the home page by date.

Please enter a date and the company
